alert.note: Alert for McCurtain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 24 at 2:32PM CST until January 25 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...McCurtain County. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Amounts will be varied across the county with the higher totals across northern McCurtain County where close to 4" inches may be possible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
